new_page.title: Create a new project
new_page.title_tooltip: The name will help your online audience identify your brand (4-30 characters)
new_page.subdomain_tooltip: Your app's globally unique subdomain, used as your URL. You cannot change your app subdomain after creation
new_page.error_min_length: Project name and subdomain must be at least 4 characters long
new_page.error_max_length: Project name cannot be longer than 30 characters
new_page.error_subdomain_taken: Project subdomain taken, please select a different subdomain
new_page.error_invalid_character: Can only contain letters, numbers, spaces and hyphens
template_page.title: Choose a Template
template_page.title_tooltip: Replace the current page template. This will discard all changes to the current page
template_page.name: Template name
template_page.publish_description: By submitting this project as a template it will go through a review and we will contact you for further details via email before making it public
template_page.private: Toggle to make this template private
dashboard.title: My Projects
dashboard.title_tooltip: Launch the no-code editor for existing projects or create a new one. Here you can also delete projects
dasboard.error_no_permission: You do not have access to this project
builder.topbar_home_tooltip_description: Manage your apps, view analytics and access learning resources
section.media_tooltip_description: Upload images and multimedia to your cloud storage to quickly use them in the editor
section.templates_tooltip_description: This action will replace the current project with the new template for all pages. Your current changes will all be lost
section.settings_tooltip_description: Edit SEO settings, metadata tags and launch properties
section.pages_tooltip_description: Select current page, add new and manage existing pages
section.blocks_tooltip_description: Drag and drop new components into the canvas üëâ
section.tutorial_tooltip_description: Learn about components and how to build full solutions using Webstudio's drag and drop blocks and configurations
page_manager.path_input_placeholder: Page path alpha numeric lower case e.g pricing
settings.title: Title
settings.description: Text displayed on the browser tab and on the social sharing links. It helps the audience understand what the project is about.
settings.placeholder: e.g The best way to build websites | Webstudio
settings.custom_domain_description: You can have your webstudio app under a custom domain if you own one already. If so, let us know below and we will contact you within 48h via email to help you set it up or change it.
settings.favicon_description: A favicon is a small icon next to your site title. It help visitors recognize your brand and stand out in their browser tabs.
settings.social_image_description: This image will be shared on social networks including Facebook and Twitter. It's a great way to help visitors recognize your brand.
action.metadata_saved_error: There was a problem saving the metadata, please contact an admin
action.auto_saved_error: There was an error saving your changes, please contact an admin
publish.tooltip: Click Publish to go live with your latest changes. Your website will be hosted in
publish.is_live_description: Your changes should be visible for visitors in the next couple of minutes and has been issued it's own certificate.
copilot.block_add: Adds this element before the currently selected element in the canvas
copilot.style_replace: Paste only styles to the currently selected element in the canvas
copilot.template_replace: Click to completely replace existing page with this new template
copilot.welcome:
Hi, I'm Studio AI, your project assistant! Ask me anything
Create a template inspired in twitter with multiple sections
Create a new section to display 6 features with images, text and description
Make a gradient of 4 purple colors that look bright
copilot.unavailable: The Studio AI is currenly unavailable, when it comes back we will automatically reconnect
copilot.type_message: Describe your project to generate a template...
